p.d: Jobless Constance returns to her home town and learns that there's a vacancy at the estate agency where she began her career. Her former boss finally ends up choosing a younger applicant. But Constance is ready to do anything to recover the job she sees as rightfully hers. Direction, screenplay: Sébastien Marnier (France, 2015) Cast: Marina FoIs (Constance), Jérémie ElkaIm (Philippe), Joséphine Japy (Audrey), Benjamin Biolay (Gilles), Jean-Luc Vincent (Alain), Jeanne Rosa (Nathalie), Véronique Ruggia-Saura (the lawyer) Genre: detective Awards: César 2017 nomination
